questiontext.text:
Install the rnoaa package if you don’t have it already. To use it, you’ll need to register at https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo-web/token, they email you a token that you can place within your R session by options(noaakey = "KEY_EMAILED_TO_YOU") (see https://docs.ropensci.org/rnoaa/articles/rnoaa.html).

We want to find the average rainfall in MALIN HEAD, EI for the year starting 2006-01-01 through to 2007-01-01.

You can access information about the Irish weather stations from ncdc_stations(locationid = "FIPS:EI")$data. Access rainfall data (called “PRCP”) using the ncdc() command. Set the stationid to the appropriate id value for MALIN HEAD, EI. Set the startdate and enddate appropriately. The datasetid is “GHCND”, and the datatypeid is “PRCP”. The values returned are in tenths of mm, so expect an average value to be somewhere generally from 10 to 100.

generalfeedback.text: Use ncdc_stations(locationid = "FIPS:EI")$data, then ncdc(datasetid='GHCND', stationid=ghcnd, datatypeid='PRCP', startdate = start_date, enddate = end_date, limit=500, add_units = TRUE)$data.

questiontext.text:
Install the rnoaa package if you don’t have it already. To use it, you’ll need to register at https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo-web/token, they email you a token that you can place within your R session by options(noaakey = "KEY_EMAILED_TO_YOU") (see https://docs.ropensci.org/rnoaa/articles/rnoaa.html).

We want to find the average rainfall in VALENTIA OBSERVATORY, EI for the year starting 1975-10-01 through to 1976-10-01.

You can access information about the Irish weather stations from ncdc_stations(locationid = "FIPS:EI")$data. Access rainfall data (called “PRCP”) using the ncdc() command. Set the stationid to the appropriate id value for VALENTIA OBSERVATORY, EI. Set the startdate and enddate appropriately. The datasetid is “GHCND”, and the datatypeid is “PRCP”. The values returned are in tenths of mm, so expect an average value to be somewhere generally from 10 to 100.

generalfeedback.text: Use ncdc_stations(locationid = "FIPS:EI")$data, then ncdc(datasetid='GHCND', stationid=ghcnd, datatypeid='PRCP', startdate = start_date, enddate = end_date, limit=500, add_units = TRUE)$data.
